abilities.desc: Adds extra pure damage to Outworld Destroyer's attacks, based on his remaining mana pool.
abilities.name: Arcane Orb
abilities.notes: The damage is calculated after the mana cost is spent.

abilities.desc: Places a target unit into an astral prison. The hidden unit is invulnerable and disabled. When the astral prison implodes, it deals damage to the target and steals a percentage of their max mana.
abilities.name: Astral Imprisonment
abilities.notes: Max mana steal does not increase Outworld Destroyer's current mana values or directly reduce the victim's mana values.

abilities.desc: Passively grants you a chance to restore a percentage of your max mana each time you cast an ability.
abilities.name: Essence Flux

abilities.desc: Unleashes a psychic blast that deals to enemies based on the difference between your mana and the target's mana. Sanity's Eclipse can hit units trapped by Astral Imprisonment.
abilities.name: Sanity's Eclipse
abilities.notes: Does not damage creeps or neutral units.
